options.description: show this help message and exit
Mandatory when no annotation provided. What organism are you dealing with? prokaryote or eukaryote.
One or two read files in .fastq or .fastq.gz format. Files can be compressed or uncrompressed. Handles interleaved read files and any known .fastq header format.
Number of subsampled reads that will be used for analysis. Must be an even number.
Mandatory when --mapped used or when no reads provided (--reads). Reference file in .fa/.fasta format. Reference can be either transcriptome or genome.
Mode can be genome or transcriptome (default genome). It defines how the reference fasta file will be handled by BUSCO. This option is used when no annotation is provided (--annotation).
Annotation file in .gff format. Needs to contain genes.
Mapped file in .bam format (Will be sorted). Reference that reads have been mapped to has to be provided.
The number of threads that can be used by GUESSmyLT. Needs to be an integer. Defualt value is 2.
Maximum memory that can be used by GUESSmyLT in GB. E.g. '10G'. Default value is 8G.
Full path to output directory. Default is working directory.
(Snakemake dryrun option) Allows to see the scheduling plan including the assigned priorities.
